text: Samsung has done it it's made the best
looking smartphone in the world this is
the Samsung Galaxy s8 after years of
uninspired and plasticky design Samsung
is leapfrog Apple's iPhone to take the
title as the most beautiful smartphone
you spy there are a lot of things to
like about the design but here are the
most important aspects that make it the
best first there's a screen the galaxy
f8 has a large 5.8 inch display that
takes up over 80% of the front of the
phone it also has curved edges that give
the impression that there are no borders
on the sides of the screen Samsung calls
this an infinity display and it's truly
gorgeous the display also uses a
technology called OLED which has better
colors and brighter images the iPhone on
the other hand is still using LCD at a
lower resolution so while it's ok it's
just not as good as the Samsung screen
next their sides that 5.8 inch screen is
actually packed onto a smaller body than
the iPhone 7 plus that makes the galaxy
si easier to hold and fit in your pocket
which brings us to the third thing
symmetry the galaxy s 8 is made from two
symmetrical pieces of glass used
together which makes it a delight to
hold in your hand but of course the
design isn't perfect in order to make
room for all that screen on the front
Samsung had to get rid of the home
button and use digital keys instead that
also means the fingerprint sensor has
been moved to the back normally I want
to have a problem with that but because
the fingerprint sensor is to the right
of the camera it's hard to find and I
often end up smudging blend it would
have been a lot better if Samsung puts a
fingerprint sensor in the center of the
back of the phone which would be much
more natural to use but overall there's
a relatively small flaws on a gorgeous
phone Apple may have a reputation for a
technical design but now the Galaxy s8
is the best-looking phone in the
[Music]
